text.text: It's probably a bit cheese...yet it is inspiring...now let's get out of this bed
You would be scared of my face in the mirror right now.
By the way, yesterday I finally finished my interactive mirror.
Maybe later I'll show you how i did it in detail. Here are some schematics for those who'd like to give it a try.
A fresh shower, some music and a cup of coffee: that's my trick to get ready for the day

media.message: uses this trick to wake up

text.text: 'Another day another challenge'...let's see what do I have to work on today
Today is a 'style-day' ahahah...let's go!! =)

media.message: had to work on styling the webapp

text.text: What would I do without these references ?!? What would I do without those who mantains them??

media.message: uses of then references maintained by other people

text.text: Time for a break
Some say it might be an illusion...well, give that developer a rise then because this ** is really good!!
Let's get back to work. I'd really like to release the restyled version today...
(co-worker) always has a good eye, but this time was really evident. I forgot to add the user Icon!! oops ':)

media.message: forgot to add an icon fot the user

text.text: For this project we found a great 3d avatar's library, let's see if I can find some new character...

text.text: This one seems to be the right one for our testing users

text.text: That's all for today. The update should be released at **

text.text: Now it's time for some personal project: I have a new idea I want to work on!

media.message: was about to start working a new personal project

text.text: I love to read and sketch, but I always end up in the dark because I'm to lazy to get to the switch

media.message: loves to read but always ends up in the dark

text.text: or because I don't have a lamp with me.
And you know how paranoid I am with creating the right ambient with lights. So I decided to build my own portable lamp.
Ok, the design is not mine actually. Yet is such a great design I have to try and rebuild it! I want to use tunable white led because you know...

media.message: was inspired by the design of Lumio

text.text: Let's get to work
Now some schematics
I need some kind of interface...Perhaps capacitive sensors??

media.message: looked on forums to find out more about capacitive sensors

text.text: I finished everything with my last project...but that's an issue for another day: let's eat something now

media.message: finished all the materials needed for the last project

text.text: Today's recipe: **
What better way to finish the day than watching a movie ?!?
Ok there are many, but I'm going for the movie tonight
What a great movie!
Time to get some rest
